name: slantingly
content:
Add to word list

in a way that slopes in one direction: The sun fell slantingly through the glass roof. The leaflet was slantingly placed on the table.
More examplesFewer examplesThe shadows of the trees fell slantingly across the path.She pulled the rope back into the boat slantingly.As soon as the cage was opened, the bird flew slantingly upward into the air.The steel was driven slantingly into the wood.Make the layers of soil slantingly, at an angle of about 45 degrees.
